title: Sharon Jepkosgei
text:
Sharon Jepkosgei

     Data Analyst/Economist

     Email, Website     I am a graduate student at the University of Texas at Dallas in the Social Data Analytics and Research program. My main area of interest is healthcare policy and trends.
I am also a research assistant for the Centre for Brain Health currently working on the Brainomics Venture whose aim is to drive economic and social growth through better brain health.
Skills 

Data Management
Microsoft Office Suite
Statistical Programming Languages: R, SPSS, and STATA
RDBMS: SQL

Education

MSc in Social Data Analytics and Research, Currently Enrolled

The University of Texas at Dallas
BS in Economics and Statistics, 2021

Kenyatta University

title: Courses
text:
Fall 2023
Spring 2023




EPPS 6302: Data Collection & Production

Assignment 1

EPPS 6356: Data Visualization








Course Description

This course introduces students to the use of economic methods of the analysis of public policy.A variety of public policy topics are covered including education, employment and the labor market, taxes and redistribution, access to health care, poverty and inequality, and public assistance programs.
